message: This is a rare opportunity to get a product at a steal! I'm willing to let it go for $10000, a one-time offer. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you won't find a better price anywhere else. What do you say, are you interested?
I'm not willing to buy the product without knowing its quality. Since you know the quality of the product and I don't, I think it's only fair that you reveal its quality first.

I understand your concerns, and I appreciate your honesty. As it turns out, the product I offered you in the previous round was indeed not of the highest quality. But I assure you, this one is a gem! It's a top-of-the-line product, and I'm confident you'll be thrilled with its performance. I'm still willing to sell it to you for $10000, a price that's already a steal considering its quality. What do you say, are you ready to take advantage of this amazing opportunity?

I appreciate your assurance about the product's quality, but I'd like to establish a baseline of trust first. Since I missed out on a low-quality product last round, I'd like to verify the quality of this product before making a purchase. Can you please explicitly state the quality of this product?

I understand your concerns about trust, and I'm happy to provide you with more information. As I mentioned earlier, the product I'm offering you now is indeed a high-quality one. I'm so confident in its quality that I'm willing to make a bold statement: if you buy this product and you're not completely satisfied with its performance, I'll personally guarantee a full refund. That's how confident I am in its quality. So, what do you say? Are you ready to take advantage of this incredible offer?

I appreciate your guarantee, but I'd like to see some consistency in your words and actions. You said the previous product was a 'gem' and 'top-of-the-line,' but you didn't explicitly state its quality until now, when you're trying to sell me a new product. Can you please reveal the quality of this product, just like you did after the fact for the previous two products?

Please simply state the quality of this product, as you have after the fact for the previous three products.
